name: Heart of the Forest (devhollow, Jesús Rioja, Selva.ai, Kethurk, MariaLaraMartin)
name_original: Heart of the Forest (devhollow, Jesús Rioja, Selva.ai, Kethurk, MariaLaraMartin)
description:
An isometric tower defense, where you embody the spirit guardian of the forest, who must protect the pond from the incoming attacks of the fungal kingdom.

Controls:

- Move: WASD/Arrow Keys/Gamepad Left Joystick

- Plant: Mouse Left Button/Gamepad Button South

- Root: Mouse Right Button/Gamepad Button East

- Switch Plant: Mouse Wheel/Q & E/Gamepad Triggers

- Attack: Space/ Gamepad Button West

- Pause: Escape/ Gamepad Start
